machine_start_gcode.default_value:
; IUM1 Start Code
G92 E0 ; Extruder Position
G21 ; Set Units to Millimeters
G28 X0 Y0 Z0 F600 ; Auto Home
G1 Z70 Y30 F600 ; Move axis F600mm/m speed
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ; Hot End Temperature
G1 E+65 F600 ; Move Extruder F600mm/m speed
G28 X0 Y0 Z0 E0 F600 ; Auto Home
G1 F{travel_speed} ; Set Travel Speed
M117 Printingâ€¦ ; Display Printing

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
; IUM1 End Code
G91 ; Relative Positioning
G1 F1300 E-2 ; Move Extruder at 1300mm/second
G28 X0 Y30 ; Auto Home
G1 E10 F200 ; Move Extruder at 200mm/second
G1 F6000 E-60 ; Move Extruder at 6000mm/second
G90 ; Absolute Positioning
G92 E0 ; Move Extruder
M84 ; Turn Off Stepper Motors
M104 S0 ; Set Hotend Temperature to Cool
M281 ; Get Servo Info
